meta.id: ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem:f
stems: ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem

hwi.hw: en*se pe*tit pla*ci*dam sub li*ber*ta*te qui*e*tem

dt: {bc}with the sword she (Massachusetts) seeks tranquil peace under liberty {bc}through battle we seek peace, but only with liberty

shortdef: with the sword she (Massachusetts) seeks tranquil peace under liberty : through battle we seek peace, but only with liberty —motto of Massachusetts
